What’s a PheedLoop?

“ Our goal is to make you an amazing presenter, by getting you the best possible feedback and connecting you with your audience like never before. ”

</br>

Lately I have been helping out with PheedLoop. It’s been fun, challenging, and rewarding all at the same time. I really love the product and the team and thanks to our kind mentors and early adopters, it has been exciting and exhilarating so far.

I really like the core principals behind PheedLoop and how they came about. Check out our blog post about it.

What have I learned so far? * It’s near impossible to balance two jobs * django development isn’t as hard as it looks. I have to respect the developers. * Marketing isn’t easy. Perhaps the others in companies don’t get enough respect from the engineers. * You can’t make a perfect product for everybody. You’ll have to make a lot of changes from the beginning.
